about_the_game:
1899: Secrets of the Maze

"1899: Secrets of the Maze" is a thrilling adventure game that combines elements of horror and mystery. Players will embark on a suspense-filled journey as they unravel the dark and enigmatic story of Subject 3.

Story

The year is 1899. The game begins in a gothic mansion. The protagonist lives in this mansion. One day, they notice a strange Rubik's cube outside their home.

As they approach the cube, they suddenly find themselves trapped in a terrifying maze.

Inside the maze, you encounter notes, bloodstains, and corpses left behind by those who ventured there before you. These notes help you piece together the secrets of a mysterious company called Dimension Technology Lab.

Over time, you discover that your character is "Subject No. 3." However, you also come across the chilling truth: only those with subject numbers have survived entering the maze.

Gameplay

"1899: Secrets of the Maze" offers gameplay that challenges both your problem-solving and survival skills. Key mechanics include:

  • Puzzles and Notes:
    Collect hidden notes throughout the maze to unravel the story and find your way out. These notes reveal the dark plans of Dimension Technology Lab and the secrets of the maze.

  • Zombies and Traps:
    The maze is filled with zombies. With limited weapons, you must think creatively and lure zombies into traps to neutralize them.

  • Laser Beams and Traps:
    Deadly laser beams and intricate traps are scattered throughout the maze. Overcome these obstacles using your intelligence and reflexes.

  • Tension-Filled Atmosphere:
    The game's sound design and visual details are crafted to keep you on edge. Dim lighting, echoing footsteps, and zombie moans create a chilling atmosphere.

Features

  • Escape Zombie Maze Connection:
    The game references "Escape Zombie Maze." Traces of Subject 19's story are hidden in this new adventure, offering a striking surprise for fans of the series.

  • Historical Atmosphere and Modern Sci-Fi:
    The gothic elements of 1899 blend seamlessly with science fiction themes, delivering a timeless horror experience.

  • Deep Story and Choices:
    Player decisions influence the outcome of the story. Every fork in the maze presents a new threat or reward.

"1899: Secrets of the Maze" delivers a unique blend of horror, suspense, and intellect.

Can you uncover the dark secrets of Dimension Technology Lab and survive as Subject 3?

content_descriptors.notes:
My game offers a horror and mystery-themed experience while including some mature content that players may want to be aware of beforehand:

    Violence and Gore:
        The game features corpses found within the maze, bloody scenes, and dark-themed visuals.
        Encounters with zombies include violent confrontations and death scenes.
        Graphic details of zombies falling into traps depict violence.

    Psychological Tension:
        The notes discovered in the game include stories of past traumas and hopelessness.
        Horror elements, sudden sound effects, and disturbing environments may trigger feelings of anxiety.

    Drugs and Experiments:
        The storyline involves uncovering unethical experiments conducted on human subjects by a corporation.
        The effects of these experiments, including mental and physical deterioration of subjects, are narrated through notes.

    Self-Harm and Despair:
        Some notes and scenes discovered in the maze subtly reference themes of self-harm and despair.

WARNING: The game does not contain any sexual content, depictions of sexual assault, or alcohol use. However, the themes mentioned above may be sensitive for some players. It is advised that players approach these themes with caution.
